casebody.data:
Howard SCHROCK, Plaintiff-Appellee/Cross-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF LINDEN, Defendant-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
and
Board of County Road Commissioners of the County of Genesee, Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellee. SC: 158786
COA: 340759 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 25, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee/cross-appellee to extend the time for filing its combined answer to the application and cross-application is GRANTED. The answer submitted on January 22, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
